channel.title: Mercenary Bug! - Occupy and Debauch
channel.description:
This happened on 2 separate occasions: #### What happened? I am mercenary as the title says and I stood by my target and my target claimed debauch. I asked him and how did he get debauched and he was puzzled but he told me he was debauched #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The drunk is supposed to get prevented because of my mercenary guard. #### Steps to reproduce: - Have a mercenary guard a target - Tell the mercenary to guard - And have a drunk debauch the target #### Comments: I find this a bug because mercenary visits should prevent occupation and target changing of the target, its like a prince jail.
#### What happened? I was mercenary and I had a target. I stood guard by this target and the next day he claimed occupied. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? My guard was supposed to prevent occupation #### Steps to reproduce: - Find a mercenary - Tell merc to stand guard - Have a butler occupy their target #### Comments: This game just happened a few moments ago, but the drunk game was a few days ago. The first time I was like there was probably a mistake but the second time I thought it had to be a bug, this costed the cult the victory.

item.title: Mercenary Bug! - Occupy and Debauch
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
I do not think so in all honesty. I mean the first time I would understand something like that could happen but the second time I would think otherwise.

Also, are you sure the second time wasn’t from a butler party?

item.title: Mercenary Bug! - Occupy and Debauch
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
This happened on 2 separate occasions:

What happened?

I am mercenary as the title says and I stood by my target and my target claimed debauch. I asked him and how did he get debauched and he was puzzled but he told me he was debauched

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The drunk is supposed to get prevented because of my mercenary guard.

Steps to reproduce:

  • Have a mercenary guard a target
  • Tell the mercenary to guard
  • And have a drunk debauch the target

Comments:

I find this a bug because mercenary visits should prevent occupation and target changing of the target, its like a prince jail.

What happened?

I was mercenary and I had a target. I stood guard by this target and the next day he claimed occupied.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

My guard was supposed to prevent occupation

Steps to reproduce:

  • Find a mercenary
  • Tell merc to stand guard
  • Have a butler occupy their target

Comments:

This game just happened a few moments ago, but the drunk game was a few days ago. The first time I was like there was probably a mistake but the second time I thought it had to be a bug, this costed the cult the victory.

Read full topic
